# As phar­mas pour bil­lions in US man­u­fac­tur­ing, CD­MOs see fu­ture op­por­tu­ni­ties

### [Anna Brown](https://endpoints.news/author/anna-brown/ "See all stories by Anna Brown")

#### News Reporter

CD­MO ex­ec­u­tives say they are un­fazed about the wave of phar­ma com­pa­nies boost­ing their in­ter­nal man­u­fac­tur­ing ca­pac­i­ty as they on­shore to the US, not­ing this …
